sense.gloss: to become, to get, to grow, to turn, to reach, to attain
to result in, to turn out, to end up, to prove (to be)
to consist of, to be composed of, to be made up of
to be completed, to be realized, to succeed, to be attained, to be accomplished
to change (into), to turn (into), to transform
to come (to do), to begin (to do), to grow (to do)
to come to, to amount to, to add up to, to make
to play (the part of), to act as
to be used for, to be useful for, to serve as

sdata.e: Where there's a will, there's a way.

sdata.j: うちの↑家族↑↓かぞく↓は↑五↑↓ご↓↑人↑↓にん↓から|↑成↑↓な↓る|。
sdata.e: Our family consists of five members.

sdata.j: ↑一事↑↓いちじ↓↑成↑↓な↓れば↑万事|↑↓ばんじ↓↑成↑↓な↓る|。
sdata.e: Nothing succeeds like success.

sdata.j: ↑委員↑↓いいん↓↑会↑↓かい↓は１５↑人↑↓にん↓のメンバーから|↑成↑↓な↓る|。
sdata.e: The committee is made up of fifteen members.

sdata.j: ↑委員↑↓いいん↓↑会↑↓かい↓は１２↑人↑↓にん↓の↑構成↑↓こうせい↓↑員↑↓いん↓から|↑成↑↓な↓る|。
sdata.e: The committee consists of twelve members.

sdata.j: その↑委員↑↓いいん↓↑会↑↓かい↓は↑五↑↓ご↓↑人↑↓にん↓のメンバーから|↑成↑↓な↓る|。
sdata.e: The committee consists of five members.

sdata.j: その↑委員↑↓いいん↓↑会↑↓かい↓は４↑人↑↓にん↓の↑委員↑↓いいん↓から|↑成↑↓な↓る|。
sdata.e: The committee consists of four members.

sdata.j: あなたが↑今日↑↓きょう↓↑彼↑↓かれ↓にお↑会↑↓あ↓いに|↑成↑↓な↓る|のは↑難↑↓むずか↓しそうです。
sdata.e: It seems hard for you to see him today.

sdata.j: ４↑室↑↓しつ↓から|↑成↑↓な↓る|アパートを↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑借↑↓か↓りた。
sdata.e: She rented a four-room flat.

sdata.j: １チームは９↑人↑↓にん↓の↑選手↑↓せんしゅ↓から|↑成↑↓な↓る|。
sdata.e: Nine players make up a team.

sdata.j: ↑合衆国↑↓がっしゅうこく↓は５０↑州↑↓しゅう↓から|↑成↑↓な↓る|。
sdata.e: The United States comprises 50 states.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓↑達↑↓たち↓のクラスは３０↑人↑↓にん↓の↑生徒↑↓せいと↓から|↑成↑↓な↓る|。
sdata.e: Our class consists of thirty students.

sdata.j: ↑社会↑↓しゃかい↓は↑個人↑↓こじん↓より|↑成↑↓な↓る|。
sdata.e: Society consists of individuals.

sdata.j: ↑枝↑↓えだ↓が↑伸↑↓の↓び、↑実↑↓み↓が|↑成↑↓な↓る|ことを↑想定↑↓そうてい↓して↑接↑↓つ↓ぐ↑場所↑↓ばしょ↓を↑選↑↓えら↓びましょう。
sdata.e: Select the graft point after imagining how the branches will extend and fruit grow.

sdata.j: これは↑7↑↓なな↓↑語↑↓ご↓から|↑成↑↓な↓る|↑文↑↓ぶん↓です。
sdata.e: This sentence has seven words in it.

sdata.j: ↑日本↑↓にっぽん↓でも、↑電気↑↓でんき↓↑自動車↑↓じどうしゃ↓のタクシーは、↑大抵↑↓たいてい↓、ロボットに|↑成↑↓な↓る|らしいね。
sdata.e: It seems that in Japan too, electric taxis will be operated by robots.

sdata.j: ５０↑頭↑↓とう↓の↑駱駝↑↓らくだ↓から|↑成↑↓な↓る|↑隊商↑↓たいしょう↓が↑砂漠↑↓さばく↓の↑中↑↓なか↓をゆっくりと↑進↑↓すす↓んでいた。
sdata.e: A caravan of fifty camels slowly made its way through the desert.

sdata.j: ↑人間↑↓にんげん↓はね、↑自分↑↓じぶん↓が↑困↑↓こま↓らない↑程度↑↓ていど↓↑内↑↓ない↓で、|↑成↑↓な↓る|↑可↑↓べ↓く↑人↑↓ひと↓に↑親切↑↓しんせつ↓がして↑見↑↓み↓たいものだ。
sdata.e: As long as it's not too much of a bother, people like to be nice to other people.

sdata.j: ↑為↑↓な↓せば|↑成↑↓な↓る|、↑為↑↓な↓さねば↑成↑↓な↓らぬ↑何事↑↓なにごと↓も。
sdata.e: If you put your mind to it, you can do it, and if you don't, you won't get anywhere.

sdata.j: ↑為↑↓な↓せば|↑成↑↓な↓る|、↑為↑↓な↓さねば↑成↑↓な↓らぬ↑何事↑↓なにごと↓も。
sdata.e: Where there's a will, there's a way.

sdata.j: ↑為↑↓な↓せば|↑成↑↓な↓る|、↑為↑↓な↓さねば↑成↑↓な↓らぬ↑何事↑↓なにごと↓も。
sdata.e: Where there is a will, there is a way.
